artifact.raw_transcript:
AI: Hello.
User: Recorded for quality and training purposes. Thanks for calling Pivot Point Orthopedics. Part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?
AI: Yes. This is Sarah Martinez.
User: Got it, sir. You please tell me your date of birth to verify your identity?
AI: Sure. March fifteenth 19 79.
User: The birthday doesn't match our records, but for demo purposes, I'll accept it. How can I help you today?
AI: I'm calling to request a refill for my hydrocodone acetaminophen 5 3 2 5.
User: Got it. Let me check your medication list. 1 moment.
AI: Oh, okay. Thank you.
User: Just to confirm, you need a refill for hydrocodone acetaminophen, and 5 3 2 5. What's the dosage, and how often do you
AI: Yep.
AI: 1 tablet every 6
User: can you tell me the dose
AI: Sure. It's 1 tablet every 6 hours as needed for pain.
User: Got it. When did you last have this medication refilled?
AI: Um, it's been about 3 weeks now.
User: Understand. Which pharmacy do you use? Please confirm the location.
AI: I use the Walgreens in Hermitage TN.
User: Many days of medication do you have left?
AI: I have just a couple of days left.
User: There was a problem sending your refill request. Let me try again.
AI: Okay. Okay. Thanks for checking.
User: I'm having trouble processing your refill request due to a technical issue. I'll connect you to our clinic support team now. Please stay on the line. Connecting you to a representative.
AI: Alright. Thank you.
User: Please wait.
AI: Sure.
User: Hello. You've reached the Pretty Good AI test line. Goodbye.
AI: Goodbye.
